block.p: 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,150-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, parquet floors, balcony and terrace, 2 exposures, common roof deck; common charge $597, taxes $9,240; listed at $899,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,150-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, parquet floors, balcony and terrace, 2 exposures, common roof deck; common charge $597, taxes $9,240; listed at $899,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,758-sq.-ft. condo in a newly constructed building; limestone baths, stainless steel kitchen with granite countertops and cherry cabinets, fireplace, balcony, building roof terrace; common charge $624, taxes $7,484; listed at $1.1 million (multiple bids), 13 weeks on market (brokers: Eychner Associates; Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, 9-ft. ceilings, marble baths, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; common charge $751, taxes $9,012; listed at $1.2 million (multiple bids), 7 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator operators, renovated kitchen, dining room, washer/dryer, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,458, 45% tax-deductible; listed at $798,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 950-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, parquet floors; maintenance $786, 25% tax-deductible; listed at $455,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: William B. May)

2-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,500-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in a prewar Art Deco building; winding staircase, renovated kitchen, den, terrace and roof deck; maintenance $812, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $885,000, 1 week on market (Broker: William B. May)

4-bedroom, 1-bath, circa 1900, semi-attached brick town house; dining room, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail, 40-by-115-ft. lot; taxes $1,614; listed at $539,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Elaine Gay Real Estate)

3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 70-year-old colonial style; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, library, fireplace, finished basement, 1-car garage, 100-by-179-ft. lot; taxes $3,549; listed at $695,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: ReMax/Millennium)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 36-year-old colonial style; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 2-car garage, 65-by-132-ft. lot; taxes $8,004; listed at $549,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Jan Kalman Realty)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old split-level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room,. fireplace, 2-car garage, 100-by-135-ft. lot; taxes $4,776; listed at $379,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Oradell)

4-bedroom Mediterranean built in 1913; 5 full and 2 half baths, dining room with bay window, library, solarium, fireplace, lawn-sprinkler system, 2-car garage, 2.1-acre landmark property with water rights; taxes $12,500; listed at $4.995 million, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Preferred Properties; Coldwell Banker/ Old Greenwich)
